save corrupted: install the game in another location eg X:\Dead Rising 2. That way the game won't conflict with the save files. If that doesn't work, check X:\Users and check all Users located there, the one with wrong characters eg "£" and a Documents\My Games\Dead Rising 2 folder is located where it shouldn't be. Grab that folder, the DR2 one and throw it inside the original User (with correct characters) like it should be.
damaged data: install the game elsewhere eg X:\Dead Rising 2 or copy the Documents\My Games folder in X:\Users\ to X:\Users\ eg "á"\My Documents (or Documents)

For those using a xbox usb controller and the option to enable the controller is greyed out, here's a fix that works and i have been using it for the last 3 days once I figured it out.
First you need to download x360ce, you can get it here:
http://code.google.com/p/x360ce/downloads/list
Place it in your dead rising 2 install directory and run it. Once in x360ce load the "controller (xbox 360 wireless reciever) preset then go to the advanced tab and disable "native mode" by unchecking it. Go to the force feedback tab and uncheck "enable force feedback". Then go to the options tab and set "fake mode" to compatibility. Now click save at the bottom, close x360ce and launch dead rising2, you can now enable it under pc settings in the options menu and all controls are pre mapped. As x360ce was run from the game folder this will not have any affect on the controller for other games.

x360ce basically creates a an xinput dll file to allow the controller to run outside of GFWL.

Hey guys, just wanted to let you know the easiest way to install this game is as follows. You will need these three files below. 

1. http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5838274/Dead.Rising.2.[NOT-CRACKED].RiP.JoeKkerr

2. http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5851833/Dead.Rising.2.Crack.Only-SKIDROW-[tracker.BTARENA.org]

3. http://www.dll-files.com/dllindex/dll-files.shtml?msvcr100

Mount #1 onto you harddrive and install
Copy and replace #2 files over your #1 install
Save #3 to you harddrive, drag and drop the .dll file into your your #1 install folder.

Launch game and enjoy !!!
